attributes.action: Regulate Creme Egg Easter egg filling to be sweet yolk instead of smaller eggs.
attributes.additional_details: "Sweet yolk" as to reference to the gooey sugar mix found in the standard Creme Egg.
attributes.background: I believe we should regulate Cadbury so that their Creme Egg Easter eggs are filled with sweet yolk instead of two smaller eggs. It is deceptive in nature - especially to the untrained eye - with how a Creme Egg logo is plastered across a box housing a supposed egg which is not filled with creme.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament cannot impose regulations on a single named company. If you want the UK Government or Parliament to take action, for example on regulation of the content of Easter eggs, you could start a new petition specifically asking for that action.
